title: Terminator TSCC S01 BD Rip 1080p HEVC ACÂ£ 5.1 EN ES FR
description:
This is the entire first season of Terminator The Sarah Connor Chronicles (TSCC) from 2008, taken directly from the Blu Ray.

This is an early blu ray, and it was fairly tricky to rip. The indexing does not work; I had to rip the raw m2ts files and extract the video, audio and subtitles from those files.

The second (much larger) and final season from 2009 will be uploaded later in 2016; again, straight from my blu-ray.

This is an h265 (HEVC) 10 bit LE 2 pass high quality 1080p rip of all 9 episodes.

I used x265 to create a VBR in 2 passes, at an average of 1200-1400kbps and peak of 3000kbps. Each episode required around 8-10 hours to encode.

The audio is 5.1 AC3 at 384kbps. 

Finally, the English, FranÃ§ais and EspaÃ±ol subtitles are included (soft coded). The SRT files are also included.

I think x265 has done a good job, creating a very good reproduction of the original blu ray files, at a fraction of the original sizes.

Please share and enjoy.


Video: 

Codec: h265 10 Bit LE
Chroma Format: 4:2:0
Framerate: 23.976
Bitrate: 1200-1300Kbps (average).
Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Mode: Progressive

Audio:

Codec: AC3 5.1
Bitrate: 384kbps

Subtitles:

Format: Subrip SRT
Encoding: UTF-8
